question: Mo Farah has won the 2017 BBC Sports Personality of the Year Award. He hails from which country?
explanation: Sir Mohamed Muktar Jama \"Mo\" Farah, who is Britain\'s most successful-ever distance runner, has won the 2017 BBC Sports Personality of the Year Award. Farah, a four-time Olympic champion, has won his third successive world 10,000m gold medal in London in August 2017. He is the first athlete to win ten global outdoor long-distance titles on the track and the first Briton to win outdoor titles in four World Championships (both consecutively and outright). With this award, he became the first long-distance runner to win the Sports Personality award since Paula Radcliffe in 2002.
